sourcesContent: import React from "react" import { Box, Checkbox, Text } from "@sanity/ui" // @ts-ignore import dragIcon from "../../../assets/pictures/dragIcon.svg" import { InterfaceContentCard, Dispatch } from "../../../services/interfacesAndTypes/common" import { handlerSetStatusDragAndDrop, handlerOnClickCheckBox } from "../../../services/functions/img" type SingleFileDataImgComponentProps = { contentCard: InterfaceContentCard | any, setArrayContentCard: Dispatch, arrayContentCard: InterfaceContentCard[], setStatusCommonCheckBox: Dispatch, statusCommonCheckBox: boolean, setStatusDragAndDrop?: Dispatch, } const SingleFileDataImgComponent: React.FunctionComponent = ({ contentCard, setArrayContentCard, arrayContentCard, setStatusCommonCheckBox, statusCommonCheckBox, setStatusDragAndDrop, }) => { const statusHeaderForList = contentCard.id === "header for list files" return ( <> setStatusDragAndDrop && handlerSetStatusDragAndDrop(e, true, setStatusDragAndDrop)} /> handlerOnClickCheckBox( statusHeaderForList, setStatusCommonCheckBox, statusCommonCheckBox, contentCard.id, arrayContentCard, setArrayContentCard ) } /> {statusHeaderForList ? ( {contentCard.src} ) : ( )} {contentCard.name} {contentCard.size} {contentCard.type} {contentCard.dimension} {contentCard.description} ) } export default SingleFileDataImgComponent
